Name: The Black Knight
About the game: Praxx stones have immense power, this in the wrong hands can be very dangerous. Thanks to the stones, all the kingdoms of the southern continent used to live in peace and harmony, but that is about to change. Lox, leader of the kingdom of Belvedor, has always wanted to possess this power to carry out his evil plan. He recently kidnapped Princess Amanda because she is one of the few people who knows where the stones are hidden. Now Diego will enter a very dangerous adventure, but he will have the help of his wizard Bartolo to find the 5 stones of Praxx and rescue the princess before it's too late. Game Features - XP system to drop the special - double jump - Secret passages - Need to collect the key and stone to open the door that gives access to the boss of each level - Fast response movement - Mobile platforms - Drag objects - Checkpoint - 6 phases Word from the developer Hey, how are you? My name is Diego Galv√£o, this is my first game and I developed it alone in 5 months, if you liked this project buy it and tell a friend, that way you will be helping so that soon we can increase the team and work on The Black Knight 2 bringing you more levels and new mechanics, thank you!l
